Package com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Disposable
    An object that holds resources/memory that cannot be automatically garbage collected by the VM.
    GridSurface
    A surface that supports a snap-to-grid property.
    PaintSurface
    A component that can be painted and that provides methods for drawing at scale, snap-to-grid behavior, scrolling, observables, and embedding Swing components.
    ScalableSurface
    An surface that has an observable scale factor associated with it.
    ScanlineSurface
    A surface that supports painting "scan lines", that is, a thin line separating rows and columns of pixels that, when visible, produces a matrix effect.
    ScrollableSurface
    A surface that can control and monitor its scroll position as a viewport view inside of a JScrollPane.
    SurfaceScrollController
    A mechanism enabling a surface to request that its scrolled position (within a JScrollPane) be changed.
    SwingSurface
    A surface to which Swing components can be added and removed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPaintSurface
    A surface that paints a layered image.
    DefaultSurfaceScrollController
    Provides basic scroll behavior when an AbstractPaintSurface is the viewport of a JScrollPane.
